articles.title: In Global Warming Red Alert, 40 Degrees Heat From US To Japan To Europe - NDTV
articles.description: Brutally high temperatures threatened tens of millions of Americans Saturday, as numerous cities braced to break records under a relentless heat dome that has baked parts of the country all week.
articles.content:
Residents of central and southern California saw thermometers peaking at 41 to 43 degrees Celsius
Rome: Tens of millions were battling dangerously high temperatures in the United States on Saturday … [+5045 chars]

articles.author: NPR
articles.title: People and pets seek shade and cool as Europe sizzles under a heat wave - NPR

articles.author: Sharon Braithwaite, Al Goodman, Barbie Latza Nadeau
articles.title: Italy issues ‘extreme’ health warning for 16 cities as heat wave grips Europe - CNN
articles.description: Italian authorities have issued an “extreme” health risk for 16 cities including Rome and Florence this weekend as a heat wave that is baking Europe threatens to bring record temperatures.
articles.content:
Italian authorities have issued an extreme health risk for 16 cities including Rome and Florence this weekend as a heat wave that is baking Europe threatens to bring record temperatures.
